#include<cstdio>
#include<cstdlib>

using namespace std;
#define mod 1000000007
long long power(int x, unsigned int y)
{
  long long temp;
  if( y == 0)
    return 1;
  temp = power(x, y/2);
  if (y%2 == 0)
    return ((temp*temp)%mod);
  else
    return ((((x*temp)%mod)*temp) %mod);
}


int main()
{
  int t,d;
  scanf("%d",&t);
  while(t--) {
    scanf("%d",&d);
    printf("%lld\n",power(7,d));
  }
  return 0;
}
